columns.name: LOG_SEQUENCE
columns.description: Unique sequence number for agent action log records.

columns.name: ACTION_RUN_SEQUENCE
columns.description: A sequence number unique to a single execution of the action.

columns.name: AGENT_RUN_SEQUENCE
columns.description: A sequence number unique to the execution of the agent triggering the action. This can be used to query corresponding records in AGENT_LOG.

columns.name: ACTION_FLOW
columns.description: The agent block (i.e. workflow or error) holding the action.

columns.name: ACTION_SEQUENCE
columns.description: The sequence of the action within the agent block. Note that (AGENT_GID, ACTION_FLOW, ACTION_SEQUENCE) uniquely identify the action and match the PK of the AGENT_ACTION_DETAILS table.

columns.name: STATE
columns.description: The action state denoted by the log entry. Every action run will have a STARTED entry when the action is published, and a COMPLETED entry when the action process is completed (i.e. all activity associated with the action completes). If an agent action raises an error, an ERROR entry is written as well.

columns.name: TIME
columns.description: UTC Time of the agent action activity

columns.name: LOG_PROCESS_ID
columns.description: Log Process ID mapping the action execution to the OTM log files. Note that this ID is only guaranteed unique within a 24 hour period.

columns.name: APP_MACHINE_GID
columns.description: The server running the agent action.

columns.name: AGENT_DATA_QUERY_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The data query type of the event that triggered the agent running the action.

columns.name: AGENT_BUSINESS_OBJECT
columns.description: The business object of the event that triggered the agent running the action.

columns.name: AGENT_ACTION_GID
columns.description: The agent action being run. Note that this doesn't uniquely specify the action within the agent since the same action may be run multiple times within one agent.

columns.name: ACTION_DATA_QUERY_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The data query type of the action's business object. This may differ from the agent's data query type if run in a DTA or FOR loop.

columns.name: ACTION_BUSINESS_OBJECT
columns.description: The action's business object. This may differ from the agent's data query type if run in a DTA or FOR loop.

columns.name: RUN_TIME
columns.description: For a COMPLETED record, the time (in seconds) between publication of the action of completion of the action process.

columns.name: ERROR_MSG
columns.description: For an ERROR record, the exception message causing the error.

columns.name: PARTITION_KEY
columns.description: AGENT_ACTION_LOG must be partitioned for easy data management. A year's worth of data is stored, dropping the oldest week or quarter.
